history.proof: intros a b. unfold cPair, sumToN. rewrite Nat.add_comm. qsimpl. sauto l: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : nat Unable to unify "nat_rec (fun _ : nat => nat) 0 (fun x y : nat => S x + y) (a + S b)" with "a".
In environment a, b : nat Unable to unify "1 <= S ?M1491" with "S a <= nat_rec (fun _ : nat => nat) 0 (fun x y : nat => S (x + y)) (a + S b) + a".

original: intros a b. unfold cPair, sumToN. rewrite Nat.add_comm. apply Nat.lt_add_pos_r. apply Nat.lt_0_succ.
